name: Taxi-Ness
description:
Taxi-Ness

Players operate a water taxi on Loch Ness ferrying customers to their required destination. Fuel costs will mount up and any damage to the boat will result in expensive repair costs.

Some passengers tip more than others, select wisely to make the most profit.

Watch out for the Loch Ness Monster!

CONTROLS:

W - Increase Power
S - Decrease Power

Your rudder steers the boat, but remember to re-center it to go straight ahead!
A - Rudder Left
D - Rudder Right

You need to line up the Port (left) or Starboard (right) side of the boat to a pontoon, between the cleats, in order to moor. A message will be displayed when you are able to stop.
E - Moor Boat

Made for the Weekly Game Jam - Theme: "Tiny Boat"
